Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 21st overall pick, by Los Angeles in 1979...
Injured on 5/29/1979 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 9/6/1979 with a Sore Shoulder, out for one week...
Traded from Los Angeles to Pittsburgh on 3/2/1981 (Going to LA: C G. Carter. Going to PIT: SS C. Ripken Jr., P S. Howe, CF J. Eisenreich)...
Earned first career win on 8/6/1983...
Injured on 5/12/1985 with a Inflamed Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/26/1986 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Injured on 9/29/1988 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 2/12/1989 to a 3-year deal worth $4,790,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/13/1992 to a 2-year deal worth $6,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 4/26/1994 to a 1-year deal worth $528,000 per year...
